title: Illusion of Death
description: Power. Envy. Greed. Lies. All surround amateur sleuths Belinda Lawrence and Hazel Whitby in this maze of personalities.  An invitation to a private screening at a film group involves them in more than the cinematic arts.  Murder and the search for a long-lost film, involve them in more hair-raising adventures as they begin to investigate each member of the group, all of whom could be potential murderers.  Belinda's skills are tested as she faces the greatest danger in her sleuthing life.
author: Brian Kavanagh
